definitions.text: a specific instance of feeling hopeful
examples: it revived their hope of winning the pennant

definitions.text: the general feeling that some desire will be fulfilled
examples: in spite of his troubles he never gave up hope

definitions.text: grounds for feeling hopeful about the future
examples: there is little or no promise that he will recover

definitions.text: someone (or something) on which expectations are centered
examples: he was their best hope for a victory

definitions.text: United States comedian (born in England) who appeared in films with Bing Crosby (1903-2003)
one of the three Christian virtues

examples: I trust you will behave better from now on
I hope she understands that she cannot expect a raise

definitions.text: be optimistic; be full of hope; have hopes
examples: I am still hoping that all will turn out well

definitions.text: intend with some possibility of fulfilment
examples: I hope to have finished this work by tomorrow evening
